inclusion.criterion: Patient with moderate to severe OSA (apnea and hypopnea index > 15/h) for whom a CPAP is indicated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient who has given oral consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient affiliated to a the national health insurance system
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Person subject to a legal protection measure (curatorship, guardianship)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Major unable or unwilling to consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Psychiatric, cognitive or neurological disorders making it impossible to assess food preferences
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient suffering from an acute infection, progressive cancer or under treatment interfering with taste
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient who smokes actively or has quit for less than 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 70 y/o with COPD on 2.5-3.5L O2 at baseline, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome, dCHF, discharged [**2132-8-24**] now presents with agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and O2 sats 70s on BipAp with 5L.
